name: easy-errors
description: This is a package for validating an object for presence of mandatory attributes. It also provides some errors you can use.

scripts.deploy: git flow release start $npm_package_version && git flow release finish -m "$npm_package_version" $npm_package_version && npm publish && git push origin master
scripts.postpatch: git add package.json && git commit -m "Bump version patch number" package*
